title: How to write an innovative idea - Quora

response.answer_text: Every successful business came about through an idea. Ideas are the foundation that sparks fire and encourages an individual to bring change. It’s important that your ideas and ‘brain dump’ live in a place that you can store safely and can come back to or continue elaborating on at any time. When your ideas are saved and can be searched and referred to at any time, it helps create a catalog of ideas that can be worked on further or implemented in the future. This is why I recommend using an online Brainstorming template for your brainstorming sessions. However, a few things you should include in Brainstorm Documentation are: ‍Title Date Facilitator Participants: Who was involved in the brainstorm ‍Goals / Issues: List the top goals you're trying to achieve or the problems you are trying to solve. ‍Research: Include web links, stats, competitor info, etc. ‍Suggestions / Ideas: Make sure to take note of all of the ideas you came up with during your brainstorming session. Idea 1 AdvantagesDisadvantages‍Continue the process for additional ideas.‍ Final Decision: Write down your final decision that your team has agreed upon. This allows there to be a documented track record of why a final decision was made.‍ Action Items You can also read this post to know more about this.

Read some research paper related to your idea and express in your writing: -what’s done so far in the area -what’s your idea -how it is innovative -attach some experiment results or finding to support it -what more you are planning to do with your idea Similarly add more content & data you feel will support your idea. All the best!
